TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TraceContextRecord extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示 ASP.NET 追蹤訊息和任何關聯的資料。

span.span: Represents an ASP.NET trace message and any associated data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件封裝追蹤訊息，而類別目錄，任何相關聯，和追蹤記錄所撰寫方法。The object encapsulates the trace message, category, any associated , and whether the trace record was written by the method. 每次呼叫和方法會產生物件加入至訊息集合。Every call to the and methods generates a object that is added to the messages collection. 您可以存取記錄的集合，藉由處理事件。You can access the collection of records by handling the event. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範您可以註冊委派以處理事件。The following code example demonstrates how you can register a delegate to handle the event. 在此範例中，`OnTraceFinished`方法存取的集合物件透過屬性，逐一查看它們，並將其寫入至回應資料流。In this example, the `OnTraceFinished` method accesses the collection of objects through the property, iterates through them, and writes them to the response stream. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Trace_3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Trace_3/CS/form3cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Trace_3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Trace_3/VB/form3vb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每次呼叫和方法會產生物件加入至訊息集合。Every call to the and methods generates a object that is added to the messages collection. 方法呼叫會設定屬性`true`，雖然方法呼叫將它設定為`false`。The method call sets the property to `true`, while the method calls set it to `false`.

summary.span: 取得追蹤記錄的使用者定義分類。

span.span: Gets the user-defined category for the trace record.

value.span: 字串，表示追蹤記錄的分類。

span.span: A string that represents a category for the trace record.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別用來進一步將追蹤訊息組織成可辨識的群組，但可以是任何字串。The category is used to better organize trace messages into recognizable groups, but can be any string. 類別會使用做為其預設類別目錄，針對這些方法會採用只有`message`參數。The class uses as its default category for methods that take only a `message` parameter. 適用於 ASP.NET，寫入數個追蹤記錄，當啟用追蹤時，預設分類為"aspx.page"。The default category for ASP.NET, which writes several trace records when tracing is enabled, is "aspx.page". ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何存取屬性，並列印它和其相關聯的追蹤訊息`Response`資料流。The following code example demonstrates how to access the property of a , and print it and its associated trace message to the `Response` stream. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Trace_5#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Trace_5/CS/form5cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Trace_5#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Trace_5/VB/form5vb.aspx#1)]

span.span: A associated with the trace record, if one exists, or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您使用追蹤來偵錯應用程式或疑難排解錯誤和例外狀況處理，您可以追蹤記錄中包含例外狀況。You can include an exception in a trace record if you are using tracing to debug an application or troubleshoot error and exception handling. 屬性是`null`追蹤記錄時相關聯的其中一個方法沒有明確`errorInfo`會提供參數或沒有例外狀況。The property is `null` when the trace record is associated with one of the methods that does not have an explicit `errorInfo` parameter or no exception is provided.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何檢查屬性來判斷是否已寫入記錄包含訊息或方法呼叫。The following code example demonstrates how to check the property of a to determine whether the message that the record contains was written by a or method call. 如果追蹤記錄一則警告訊息，不同的動作會採取會出現錯誤訊息。If the trace record is a warning message, a different action is taken than if it is an error message. summary.span: 取得使用者定義的追蹤訊息。

value.span: 字串，表示追蹤記錄的訊息。

span.span: A string that represents a message for the trace record.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 訊息可以是任何字串，並用於寫入詳細的追蹤資訊。The message can be any string, and is used to write detailed tracing information. 它會對應至訊息參數傳遞給和方法。It corresponds to the message parameter that is passed to the and methods. 資訊可以是執行階段值，訊息，引導您，並引導您完成程式的執行或其他診斷資料。The information can be run-time values, messages to orient you and guide you through a program's execution, or other diagnostic data. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何存取屬性，並列印到`Response`資料流。The following code example demonstrates how to access the property of a , and print it to the `Response` stream. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Trace_4#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Trace_4/CS/form4cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Trace_4#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Trace_4/VB/form4vb.aspx#1)]
